description: Sent when a renter requests to extend an active rental.
Sent when a rental is cancelled by either party before completion.
Sent 24 hours before the rental end date. Time-sensitive alert.
Sent on the morning of the rental end date. Time-sensitive alert.
Sent when a renter submits a new rental request. This is an IN-APP ONLY chat message and does NOT trigger email/push.
Sent when the scheduled return time passes. Critical alert.
Sent immediately after a rental payment is successful.
Sent when a renter submits a formal rental request pending approval.
